column4: how come ubuntu does not ship with ssl certificates for positive ssl (from comodo)
you should ask one of the developers
how do i ask one of them?, other computers don't give an ssl error but ubuntu does :(
I was being sarcastic. I think if you were to ask a dev "why don't you put this feature in by default" you'd get yelled at
then how can i get comodo included by default?, it is a valid ssl vendor and lots of sites use them
it sounds like you're going to have to set it up yourself. If you know enough to use ssl then setting it up shouldn't be an issue.
